ingredients.content: 200 - 250 g courgettes, cut in pieces (3 cm)
100 g hard goat's cheese, cut in pieces
½ tsp fine sea salt, to taste
¼ tsp ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place courgettes in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to Varoma dish and set aside.
Place water in mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish into position, weigh in peas and asparagus tips then steam <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Set Varoma aside and keep warm.

Insert simmering basket, weigh in penne pasta then cook <b>select time indicated on packet/100°C/speed 1<b>. Remove simmering basket with aid of spatula, stir olive oil through pasta then set aside and keep warm. Discard cooking water then dry mixing bowl.
Place goat's cheese and garlic in mixing bowl then grate <b>4 sec/speed 4<b>.
Add basil, yoghurt, salt, pepper and reserved steamed vegetables then heat <b>3 min/70°C//speed 1<b>.
Add reserved cooked pasta and heat <b>3 min/90°C//speed <b>. Serve pasta immediately.
